title: CS 203: Software Tools and Techniques for AI
text:
Lecture Slides


Data Collection and Labeling
Comprehensive, code-heavy slides for beginners covering: - Data Collection: Python logging, web scraping, APIs, databases - Data Validation: Pydantic, Pandas, handling missing data - Data Labeling: Label Studio, inter-annotator agreement, active learning - Data Augmentation: PIL, OpenCV, text augmentation, SMOTE
